snippet: Kashmiri students at a university in India were punished after they cheered for the Pakistani team during a televised cricket match against India.
abstract: Kashmiri students at a private university in northeastern India are suspended indefinitely and removed from their dorms after they cheered for the Pakistani team during a televised cricket match against India.
lead_paragraph: Kashmiri students at a university in India were punished after they cheered for the Pakistani team during a televised cricket match against India.

headline.main: Suspensions for Students Who Rooted Against India
headline.print_headline: Suspensions for Students Who Rooted Against India
